g.t: 다른 플레이어의 타운홀을 파괴하여 노스가드의 지배자가 되십시오.
고대의 지식을 발견하여 현명한 부족의 지도자가 되십시오.
전설속의 세계수 이그드라실 을 찾고, 가장 먼저 정복하십시오.
헬하임의 관문 을 점령하고, [Valkyrie]s 들의 저항을 막아내십시오.
충분한 [Territory]를 얻고 당신의 [Fame]을 드높여 왕의 작위를 얻으십시오.
용암의 땅에 대장간 을 짓고, [Iron]을 사용하여 오딘의 전설의 검을 만드십시오.
이 영역은 아직 탐험하지 않았습니다. 정찰병을 보내십시오.
멸망 시킬 경우 아래의 자원을 획득합니다 ::resList::.
영토를 점령할 경우 아래의 자원을 획득합니다 ::resList::.
Forge the ::part:: of the Sword of Odin for ::count::.
Colonize the area to become protector of Northgard and achieve victory!
Colonize the Gates of Helheim and keep it under your control to achieve victory!
Build a Forge in this area and forge the Sword of Odin to achieve victory!
Jeremy Vitry|Etienne Makowski|Elodie Perquis|Anaïs Maamar|Etienne Hebinger|Etienne Pov|Aurore Solé
Philippe Renouil|Nicolas Cannasse|Sébastien Vidal|Frédéric Oughdentz|Adrien Briatta
This area can't be colonized at this time.
There is no building in this area.
Halvard and the Heidrun Clan have met their end.
The mercenary search party will arrive in ::value:: months.
Hvedrung will soon blow the Gjallarhorn. We should brace ourselves!
This area is uninhabitable due to toxic fumes, sullied water and disease-bearing insects.
The powerful Champion of Jötunnheim's workers, here to help you overthrow the lords who have inherited the land.
Seize the means of wool production!
The dreaded Judicator of Jötunnheim, supreme enforcer of the lords' inherited authority and defender of private property.
Choose a faction or assist in crushing the other.
Skrymir is the king of Jötunnheim and owner of the land. His people strongly believe this entitles them to the products of the sheep.
Fjolsvin leads the workers of Jötunnheim. This faction believes their hard work should prevail over inherited property in the distribution of goods.
Train your villagers to become [Smith]s and forge the mighty Wurmslayer using [RimeSteel].
Only a Smith of the Bear Clan can forge the famed Wurmslayer.
Train your villagers to become [Smith]s and forge the Wurmslayer.
[::unit::] is gravely wounded and will return to fight the Hrímgandr after recovering.
축하드립니다! You have achieved a ::vname:: victory!
축하드립니다! Your team has achieved a ::vname:: victory!
타운홀이 파괴 되었습니다. 당신의 부족은 패배하였습니다...
Quit game without saving your progress?
Quitting the game now will end the session and disconnect all players!
모든 축복에 도달하여 지혜 승리에 도달하십시오!
Choose which resource your merchants will sell to earn [Money]:
Choose which faction to trade with:
You can't trade with a clan you're at war with
You can't trade with the opposing [Giant] faction!
They will not accept this resource.
The Boar Clan can't trade with other clans.
You can't trade with this clan.
You can't trade the same resource twice with the same clan.
You haven't met any other clans yet.
This mine is depleted. You can destroy it.
[Mender] 의 회복속도가 ::percent:: 증가하고 [Lore] 의 생산량이 ::percent:: 증가합니다.
[::id::]s produce ::percent:: more [Fame] and [Happy], and ::percent:: more [Money] with [GreatDeeds].
Increases [Healer]s' healing speed by ::percent::. They also produce ::percent:: more [Food] with [Medecine].
Increases [::id::]s' attack range and power by ::percent::.
Doubles [::id::]s' protection against ranged attacks and increases resistance by ::percent::.
[Scout] 이 새로운 영역을 정찰하기 위해서는 정찰병 막사가 필요합니다.
Word of your success as a leader has reached other clans, and you have gained a new ability.
You don't have enough space to increase your population. Build more houses.
There are no wounded or sick units to heal within your territory.
You need more [Happy] to grow your population.
There is no area left for your [Sailor]s to explore.
용병들은 선택한 해안에 침공하여 승리를 거둘경우 계속 머물러있습니다.
Earn [Prestige] with Great Trade Routes and work toward a Trade victory.
You don't have enough [Money]s to create a Great Trade Route.
Build a Lighthouse on this ::portKind:: to unlock Great Trade Routes.
One of your ports already has a Lighthouse.
현재 행복도는 +::v:: 입니다. 새 시민이 생기기까지 ::time:: 일 소요됩니다.
This is your current clan size. You have enough houses for ::max:: people.
Your current Warband size. Build training camps to increase it.
Build more training camps to increase the size of your Warband!
You are friendly with the [Myrkalfar]. They will not attack you anymore.
The Clan of the Snake cannot gain [Fame].
You can't repair a building while under attack!
Winter: your military units get ::percent:: power when fighting outside of your territory. Food production is reduced and Wood consumption is increased.
Summer: make sure to stock up on Food for the coming winter.
Allows you to train one more [::unit::], and all [::unit::]s in this area gain a ::percent:: [::res::] production bonus.
You need more houses to recruit this [::unit::].
When activated, newly trained [::unit::]s will automatically rally to your [::name::].
When activated, newly trained [::unit::]s will automatically rally to [::name::].
This building doesn't take up a slot in the area.
Requires an area with a natural Food resource
This building is already present in this area
[ScorchedEarth] : -::malusProd::% production, snakes military units and buildings have +::snakeBonus::% bonus attack
You can use [ScorchedEarth] in this area
Signy must be in the center of the territory to use [ScorchedEarth]
The Vedrfolnir scouts areas for the clan that helped him.
Warchief and upgraded towers get +::percent::% Attack
Click or press [::hotkey::] to view conditions for victory.
You can smuggle goods to this clan using the Black Market.
You are currently at war with ::name::!
Trade with him to improve them.
Trading is suspended during this time.
A feast gives +::const:: and ::percent:: bonus to all production and [Happy] for one month, as well as +::fame::.
A feast gives +::const:: and ::percent:: bonus to all production and [Happy] for one month.
Allows you to improve your units' tools, increasing their abilities.
You have some free tool upgrades available!
You have free tower upgrades available!
식량 보관고가 꽉 찼습니다! 식량 저장고를 더 지어야합니다!
부족이 추위에 떨고있습니다! 목재를 수집해야 합니다!
건물을 유지할 수 없습니다! 크로나가 더 필요합니다
인구가 더이상 늘어날 수 없습니다! 집을 더 지어야합니다!
인구가 더이상 늘어날 수 없습니다! 우리는 행복해야합니다!
우리는 살아남고 있습니다... 하지만 확실한것은 더 행복해야합니다.
Our people are overjoyed and grateful to you. Keep it up!
We need to bring a villager here to advance the construction!
Some of us don't have anything to do for now...
Some of us don't have a house!
부족이 추위에 떨고있습니다! 목재를 수집해야 합니다!
우리중 환자가 있습니다! 죽기전에 치료해야 합니다!
We have enough [Lore] to acquire Knowledge!
We can obtain a new blessing from the gods!
We are too far from our territory! Our attack power is reduced by ::inv_percent::.
You can't colonize an area that is defended.
You can't colonize when you don't have a safe area you control next to it.
You can't colonize while your nearby territory is under attack!
You can't colonize this territory because it is not exploitable.
Increases the number of possible buildings in this area (only once).
::months:: months until a new transfer is available.
Tags can be used by other players to look for your game.
You can only use this action inside your territory.
::name:: must be in your friends list to join the game!

Mute Options
Toggle channels and/or players messages
Our clan is starving! We need to produce and store more [Food]!
Our clan is freezing! We need to produce and store more [Wood]!
Our clan is unhappy! We need to increase our [Happy] by recruiting [Innkeeper]s!
We can't pay our building upkeep! One of our ::name:: has been damaged. Repair it or it will burn!
Our clan can't grow because it needs more houses!
Our clan can't grow because it is unhappy!
You have no [::res::]: Trade Route with ::name:: has stopped.
You have no [::res::]: Great Trade Route has stopped.
Our territory is under attack! We need to defend ourselves!
Some of our units are under attack! We need to defend ourselves!
우리는 이 영역의 제어권을 잃었습니다! 다시 되찾으세요!
정찰병이 유적에서 고대의 재물을 찾았습니다. ::gold:: 와 ::lore:: 을 획득했습니다.
정찰병이 난파선 조사를 마쳤습니다. ::wood:: 와 ::gold:: 를 획득했습니다.
Our scouts found some riches in the abandoned houses. We have gained ::wood:: and ::gold::.
We have established contact with ::name::. How should we deal with them?
We have established contact with ::name::, leader of the ::clan:: Clan.
We defeated the Wyvern! We have gained ::resList::.
The mighty Wyvern has been defeated by ::name::!
We can't store any more Food! Build more Food Silos.
::name:: has been defeated by ::by::! You gain ::resList::.
::name:: are now your friends! [GiantHero] has joined your clan and is waiting at your Town Hall!
::name:: has befriended ::by::! He has gained tremendous power with this alliance!
[Myrkalfar]s are now your friends! They will not attack you anymore.
Our attack has soured relations with ::name::!
Our [Scout] was hurt while exploring a new area.
Our [Scout] died while exploring a new area.
We have discovered the ::name::. We should take control of it to achieve victory (you gain ::fame::).
We have discovered the ::name::. We should take control of it to achieve victory.
::name:: has discovered the ::bname::! Let's take control of it to achieve victory.
We have discovered the ::name::: it will help us achieve victory (you gain ::fame::).
::name:: has discovered the ::bname::! It could help us achieve victory.
We have discovered an active ::name::! (you gain ::fame::).
We have enough [Lore] to acquire new Knowledge.
Congratulations! Our clan has made it to a new year!
::name:: has obtained ::blessing::! ::count:: more and they will achieve victory!
Our [Sailor]s have explored a new area!
We have destroyed a ::bname:: and gained ::resList::.
::name:: has started colonizing the Yggdrasil! We need to hurry and stop them!
You reached ::amount::! New riches are coming to us!
::name:: has just finished forging the ::part:: to the Sword of Odin!
A mercenary ship has been spotted near our coasts! We must prepare!
A mercenary ship has been spotted nearby.
::name:: has transferred control of a new area to you.
Your ally ::allyName:: is being attacked by ::name::! He might need your help!
[Vedrfolnir] is healed! He will now help us explore Northgard. We have gained ::lore::.
A ship came back from a Great Trade Route. We have gained ::res1::, ::res2:: and ::res3::.
You've gained control of ::nb:: [SpecterWarrior]s by studying an [AncientGraveyard]
You've gained a free Defense Tower upgrade.
::name:: has landed on the shores of Northgard!

라그나로크에서는 새로운 맵, 독특한 이벤트와, 새로운 타일, 중립 세력과 몬스터가 추가됬습니다!
새로운 군사 경험치 시스템과 대족장의 고유한 스킬을 얻을수 있는 기능이 포함되어있습니다.
You have left a ranked game. Wait ::time:: to play.
Game creation requested. Waiting for the server to respond.
Inappropriate word(s) have been found in your game's name. Please change it and retry.
Inappropriate word(s) have been found in your game's tags. Please amend your tags and retry.
Please choose at least one victory condition.
Season ::name:: is now over. Fight for your spot on the leaderboards now! ::gloryPoints:: have been reset. The new season is now open until the next major update.
Bonus objectives will be revealed once you complete the chapter for the first time.
Congratulations! You can now use story mode Heroes as Warchiefs in single-player and multiplayer modes!
Click the Build button to construct a building. Select any spot in the area to place the building.
Click Build to construct another building. Select either a Woodcutter's Lodge to produce [Wood] or a Scout Camp to discover new areas.
Your building is ready! Click to select a [Villager]. Clicking twice will select all units with the same job in a given area.
Select a unit and right-click on the Woodcutter's Lodge to turn your [Villager]s into [Woodcutter]s. You can right-click several times to issue multiple orders.
Select a unit and right-click on the Scout Camp to turn your [Villager]s into [Scout]s.
You need [Scout]s to explore Northgard. Build a Scout Camp and turn one of your [Villager]s into a [Scout].
You need [Woodcutter]s to produce [Wood]. Build a Woodcutter's Lodge and turn one of your [Villager]s into a Woodcutter.
Your [Scout]s will discover new areas. Please wait until your [Scout] has finished discovering an area.
This new area is defended by enemies! Build a Training Camp and turn one of your [Villager]s into a [Warrior].
Select your [Warrior] and right-click on the area occupied by foes to attack them! Recruiting several [Warrior]s will increase your chances of victory but reduce your [Food]/[Wood] production.
To expand your territory, you need to colonize the new area using [Food]. Click on the area and spend some [Food] to colonize it.
The colonized areas will allow you to construct new buildings. Make sure to store enough [Food] and [Wood] to survive Northgard's harsh winters.
[Happy] is of paramount importance. DO NOT let it fall below 0. It automatically earns you new villagers, doing so faster as it increases. Keep it as high as you possibly can.
Rats have infested our Food reserves, and we lost ::count::! We should build more Food Silos!
Rats have spread disease. ::count:: of our members are sick!
Our silos have protected us from the rat infestation.
An earthquake has damaged ::count:: of our buildings. We need to repair them quickly!
Well done! You helped Svarn by giving him ::nbRes:: [::res::]. You get ::fame:: [Fame] and a [Happy] bonus until the next request.
You failed to help Svarn with [::res::]!
결투|개인전|2v2 팀전|3v3 팀전|2v2v2 팀전|4v4 팀전|2v2v2v2 팀전
Oops... an error has occured while trying to join the game.
You need to log in through Steam to access multiplayer. If Steam is already connected, please restart it.
An error occurred while opening the server socket.
Failed to connect to game server.
Connection to game server lost. Retrying...
You already have a ranked game in progress.
Your game version and the host version do not match.

t.font: ::name:: has been disconnected for ::time::mn. An AI has temporarily taken control of the clan.
An AI has taken control of the clan.

g.t: The server is not responding. Check your connexion or try again later.
You've been invited to a Ranked game but your ranking couldn't be retrieved from the server.
Your ranking will be updated at the end of the game.
The server is not responding. Your ranking can't be updated.
Congratulations, you have reached a new league!
You have been demoted from your league...
You have been promoted to a higher league!
You have been demoted to a lower league.
